address: via Baldonò 1, lago di Velo d'Astico
description: This small chalet - style villa overlooks the valley. It has an attractive, elegant and quiet dining room decorated with a feminine touch and a panoramic outdoor terrace. Modern cuisine from the Veneto takes pride of place on the menu.
